name: Brainsphere
overview: A strategic board game for up to 4 players, coded in Amos Pro by Volker Stepprath. Several different starting boards are available for use. The goal is to get the largest amount of dots changed to your team color. Jump and work around to leave balls. A strategic game for 1 up to 4 players, the aim is to leave balls after you turned so that other player couldn’t take a move anymore. But be careful cause there are pitfalls on board.
